title: Departure tax
data: The Passenger Movement Charge is included in the ticket price
€7 ( short distance ) €15 ( medium dist . ) €35 ( long dist . )
Domestic flights like short distance , but including value added tax . Tax levied through carrier of flight . Information based on Flugabgabegesetz ( FlugAbgG )
Charges at land border exits . Must be paid in cash ( taka ) at any branch of Sonali Bank ; a bank booth is available at all land exits

If the final destination is not Indonesia , Malaysia or the Philippines , then the tax is BN $ 12 . If transiting through one of these countries , the higher tax rate still applies , even if the initial flight destination is located in Indonesia , Malaysia or the Philippines . Paid in cash at check-in

Although the passenger departure tax in Bermuda is levied to the owner of Airline for every departing passenger , this is squarely passed on to the passenger as part of the overall ticket fare . There are exceptions in case of children under 2 years , transit passengers and in some other cases . A tax of $ 35 is charged for every departing passenger . Also a Yacht arrival Tax in Bermuda is charged to the owner of the arriving yacht . Presently $ 35 is charged for each passenger arriving by the yacht
Included in airline tickets as of 2011
Charged to all visitors leaving by air . Fees are included in airline tickets

Charged to all visitors leaving by air . Must be paid in cash ( US dollars or colones ) , or is charged as a cash advance on a credit card . Departure taxes are included in most air ticket prices , depending on which airline
Included in air ticket price since April 2015
Paid in cash upon departure . Departure taxes are included in most air ticket prices , depending on which airline
Charged to all visitors leaving by air starting from November 2019
€7.50 ( band A countries ) / €42.18 all other countries
for more details on Luftverkehrsteuergesetz ( LuftVStG ) see German air passenger taxes
Payable at the airport on departure
Only applies to air . Small land departure tax
Included in tickets . Refundable in some cases
Only applies to Iranian citizens and should be paid at the airports or Melli bank branches . 1st time of the year : $ 18 2nd time of the year : $ 27 3rd time and/or more of the year : $ 35
The Irish Air Travel Tax ( Cáin Aerthaistil ) was abolished in the 2014 Budget
200,000 Rupiah / 75,000 Rupiah at some airports , e.g . Bandung
To be paid in cash ( IDR only ) , charged to all visitors leaving by air . Fees are included only in Garuda Indonesia and Citilink tickets
intro: A departure tax is a fee charged (under various names) by a country when a person is leaving the country. Some countries charge a departure tax only when a person is leaving by air. Various rules apply to the payment of the tax, including payment at the airport to those about to catch a flight (sometimes only in the local currency and sometimes by credit card), or by some prepayment method, or it may be charged to the airlines and included in the airline ticket price.
